name: FaithCovenantChurch
0:
”Alexa, open faith covenant church”
”Alexa, ask faith covenant church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start faith covenant church”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: faith covenant church
des: Listen to the latest sermon from Faith Covenant Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current sermon. You can also ask for previous and next sermons by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
